wikipedia_page.main: Samantha Bowen (born 21 March 1986) is a former British soldier and British sitting volleyball player. Bowen was discharged from the British Army in 2008 after suffering shrapnel wounds following a mortar attack during active duty in Iraq. Bowen subsequently took up the sport of sitting volleyball and represented Great Britain at the 2012 Summer Paralympics.

response: * Samantha Bowen (1986–), soldier and paralympic sitting volleyball player
**31 December – Olympian Dai Greene and Paralympian Samantha Bowen are the mystery runners at the 2012 Nos Galan road race.
